com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.engine.optimizer.probability.impl
Class ProbabilityIndexModel

java.lang.Object
  com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.engine.optimizer.probability.impl.ProbabilityBase
      com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.engine.optimizer.probability.impl.ProbabilityIndexModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Probability
public class ProbabilityIndexModel
extends ProbabilityBase

The implementation for the probabilistic index model based on the specialized RDF index. This implementation provides probability estimations for both single triple patterns and joined triple patterns. Hence, it is more powerful but less accurate compared to the probabilistic data model for the probability estimation of triple patterns.

Author:
Markus Stocker

getProbability

public double getProbability(com.hp.hpl.jena.graph.Triple triple1,
                             com.hp.hpl.jena.graph.Triple triple2)
Get the estimated probability of joined triple patterns. The second triple pattern (triple2) might be null, in which case the probability of the single triple pattern (triple1) is returned. If the index does not support joined probability calculation (because of the index level 0), the probability returned is 1.0 and a warning is sent to logging. This method is by far the most complex and it considers different correction heuristics to estimate the probabilities of joined triple patterns.

Specified by:
getProbability in interface Probability
Specified by:
getProbability in class ProbabilityBase
Parameters:
triple1 -
triple2 -
Returns:
double
